Summary: From 13th Street looking up to the east an amber colored orb flew west silently and made a u-turn to head back east before dissappearing into the clouds.
divs: Sighting DetailsAfter parking my vehicle in the driveway at about 10:15 p.m 06-24-09 I looked up to the east sky and noticed an amber colored sphere flying west. As it became closer I noticed it didn't make any sound. It made some sort of u-turn in the sky and then flew eastward. unlike the lifeflight helicopter at bryan west hospital it made no sound nor did it have any blinking lights. It was solid in amber light color and was very bright.When it ducked into the clouds I could still partially see the bright object for a minute longer before it was absolutely no longer visible. Upon seeing the object I opened the door to the house and yelled to my wife that there was a ufo. We have seen another ufo in lincoln about three years ago and did not report it then. This time I really didn't have enough time to get the camera focused on it. I tried
trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Lincoln
There were no other sightings in Lincoln on or around May 24th 2009
